Today, North is seeing some solid action with 9 ft @ 17s W swell and S winds at 14 mph. Fistral and Town are both working well, especially during the tide window from 08:16 to 16:17. Tomorrow, conditions take a turn for the worse with strong WSW winds at 29 mph, making it poor across all coasts. By the day after, the swell drops to 7 ft @ 10s WSW, but with similar wind conditions, it remains poor. Best: today.
